subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace in Jaipur was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
question_hi: जयपुर महाराजा जयसिंह जी ने किस उच्चित्राणी बनाई।
C_en: Cenotaph of Prince Sawai Mansingh II
C_hi: सावाई मंसिंग बी का खालीदा मंत्रालय
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as Palace of Winds, is the famous palace in Jaipur built by Maharaja Pratap Singh.
explanation_hi: हैवा महाल, महाराजा प्रतप सिंग ने बनाया हैवा महाल
